todos.content: Phase 1: Install fastify-type-provider-zod and update server setup
todos.activeForm: Installing fastify-type-provider-zod and updating server setup

todos.content: Phase 2: Create response schemas in server/schemas/response.schema.ts
todos.activeForm: Creating response schemas in server/schemas/response.schema.ts

todos.content: Phase 3: Refactor projects routes to use Zod schemas
todos.activeForm: Refactoring projects routes to use Zod schemas

todos.content: Phase 4: Create auth schemas and refactor auth routes
todos.activeForm: Creating auth schemas and refactoring auth routes

todos.content: Phase 5: Clean up duplicate authenticate functions and type augmentations
todos.activeForm: Cleaning up duplicate authenticate functions and type augmentations

todos.content: Phase 6: Fix logging to use fastify.log consistently
todos.activeForm: Fixing logging to use fastify.log consistently

todos.content: Phase 7: Improve type safety with proper interfaces
todos.activeForm: Improving type safety with proper interfaces

todos.content: Phase 8: Add security essentials (CORS, rate limiting, JWT_SECRET requirement)
todos.activeForm: Adding security essentials (CORS, rate limiting, JWT_SECRET requirement)

todos.content: Phase 9: Add documentation (JSDoc, WebSocket protocol, server README)
todos.activeForm: Adding documentation (JSDoc, WebSocket protocol, server README)

todos.content: Update spec file with completion checkmarks and notes
